Uses of Interface
org.glassfish.appclient.client.acc.AppClientContainer.Builder

  • Packages that use AppClientContainer.Builder 
    Package Description
    org.glassfish.appclient.client.acc  

    • Uses of AppClientContainer.Builder in org.glassfish.appclient.client.acc

      Classes in org.glassfish.appclient.client.acc that implement AppClientContainer.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AppClientContainerBuilder
      Implements a builder for accumulating configuration information for the app client container and then starting the ACC.
      Methods in org.glassfish.appclient.client.acc that return AppClientContainer.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AppClientContainer.Builder AppClientContainer.Builder.addMessageSecurityConfig(MessageSecurityConfig msConfig)
      Adds an optional MessageSecurityConfig setting.
      AppClientContainer.Builder AppClientContainer.Builder.authRealm(String className)
      Sets the optional authentication realm for the ACC.
      AppClientContainer.Builder AppClientContainer.Builder.clientCredentials(String user, char[] password)
      Sets the optional client credentials to be used during authentication to the back-end.
      AppClientContainer.Builder AppClientContainer.Builder.clientCredentials(String user, char[] password, String realm)
      Sets the optional client credentials and server-side realm to be used during authentication to the back-end.
      AppClientContainer.Builder AppClientContainer.Builder.containerProperties(List<Property> containerProperties)
      Sets the container-level properties.
      AppClientContainer.Builder AppClientContainer.Builder.containerProperties(Properties containerProperties)
      Sets the container-level Properties.
      AppClientContainer.Builder AppClientContainer.Builder.logger(Logger logger)
      Sets the logger which the ACC should use as it runs.
      static AppClientContainer.Builder AppClientContainer.newBuilder(TargetServer[] targetServers)
      Creates a new ACC builder object, preset with the specified target servers.
      AppClientContainer.Builder AppClientContainer.Builder.sendPassword(boolean sendPassword)
      Sets whether the ACC should send the password to the server during authentication.
